properties.title: Cabane Arpitettaz CAS
properties.description: Surrounded by Weisshorn, Zinalrothorn and Besso, this renovated alpine cabin is very attractive due to the impressive high alpine environment in the rearmost area of Val d'Anniviers. All the ascents are high alpine ventures. The cabinâ€™s terrace invites the guests to stay and enjoy the glacier universe. Access is feasible for hikers, whereas the alpine col to the Tracuit cabin is only recommended for experienced mountain hikers.
